section.heading: Notice of changes to services or supports.
section.text: The Department shall provide written notice to a program participant before terminating, reducing, or changing their support services. The notice shall advise the program participant of the action the Department plans to take, the reason for the action, the date the action will be taken, and the program participant's right to request a hearing as provided under § 4-281.05.
